name: A pair of charred iron bracers
data: It increases the users intelligence a bit.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users psionic resistance somewhat.
The bracers radiate with magic, alien but powerful. Whatever its purpose is, it cannot be unveiled in this manner.
